prompt: Deadpan corporate technical diagram, clean vector lines, subtle shadows, off-white background, muted slate + graphite with cyan and safety orange accents. Big central diagram, consistent title placement top-left. Only include the exact text specified. No other text or numbers. Title text in top-left: 'KV cache'. Diagram: A KV cache block with reuse arrows and a small dimmed eviction bin labeled 'evict'. Only text: 'KV cache', 'evict'.
rubric: The slide uses a clean, technical diagram style with deadpan humor.
No extra text appears beyond the specified labels.
Reuse arrows appear in the KV cache.

improvements: Deadpan humor aspect is minimal; consider a slightly more ironically formal or exaggeratedly serious visual touch (while staying text-free) to better read as ‘deadpan’ rather than purely neutral corporate.
Eviction bin could be even more visually de-emphasized (e.g., lighter opacity or smaller size) to further contrast with the bold reuse arrows and central KV block.
grade.summary: All rubric items are met: the slide has a clean corporate technical style, the title text is exactly 'KV cache' in the top-left, only the allowed labels ('KV cache', 'evict') are present, reuse arrows are clearly shown around the KV cache block, and eviction is represented by a dimmed trash bin labeled 'evict' that’s visually de-emphasized relative to the main diagram.
